src:
Košarkaški trans u Italiji zbog Teodosića, pljušte poređenja sa Maradonom, Danilovićem, Kićanovićem…
Zato je lažni mit da je Teo nije dobar u odbrani? Koje sličnosti ima sa Draženom Petrovićem? Zašto se velikani na terenu ne pokazuju emocije? Koji velikan je kupio unuku Teov dres?

01 Nov 2019

(Od dopisnika MOZZART Sporta iz Rima)
Pobedonosni koš Miloša Teodosića protiv Monaka u Evrokupu je poslužio kao šlagvort Korijere delo Sportu da mu posveti čitavu stranicu podsećajući da je Milošu bilo dovoljno mesec dana da “zaludi” Bolonju i košarkašku Italiju. Teodosić je bio alfa i omega u svim pobedama Virtusa u oktobru, ali je u mečevima protiv Venecije, Virtusa, Breše i Monaka bukvalno odlučivao konačan rezultat u prelomnim ili poslednjim sekundama mečeva.
Koš protiv Monaka sa zvukom sirene koji je doneo pobedu Virtusu doveo je do ushićenja Paladocu i naveo Korijere da sprovede malu anketu među košarkaškim legendama. Dan Peterson, Čarli Rekalkati i Renato Vilalta su pričali o Teodosiću u superlativima u tekstu koji je naslovljen “Teodosić je naš Maradona”.
“Ja sam zaljubljen u Teodosića”, rekao je Rekalkati i dodao da je u Moskvi kupio dres Teodosića, dok je Miloš igrao za CSKA, na poklon svom unuku.“Malo je igrača koji su u stanju da pogađaju odlučujuće šuteve u završnici meča. Miloš je jedan od njih. Počeo sam da ga pratim od EP  u Gorici za igrače mlađe od 20 godina kada je proglašen za najboljeg igrača. Teodosić je prvi igrač koji ti padne na pamet kada misliš ko bi mogao da igra košarku kakvu ti želiš. Veliko je zadovoljstvo gledati ga kako on radi s lakoćom stavi koje su drugim izuzetno teške. Oduševaljava me način na koji kontroliše tok utakmice. Ne igra uvek isto, prilagođava se toku meča i potrebama svog tima”, rekao je Rekalkati.
Italijanski stručnjak kaže i da je lažni mit da Teodosić ne igra dobro odbranu. “U suštini on dobro čita protivničke akcije i zna da ih predupredi iako je mnogo bolji u ispunjavanju drugih zadataka. Zagrljaj koji je dobio od klupskih drugova posle meča sa Monakom nije banalna stvar i nije instinktivan gest. To je bilo priznanje njegove liderske uloge u timu”, smatra Rekalkati.
Rekalkati je dodao da poslednji šut protiv Monaka nije bio u stilu Danilovića već Bazilea. Legendarnog Dana Petersona, koji ima duže pamćenje od Rekalkatija, šut je podsetio na Dragana Kićanovića.“Teodosićev koš me je vratio u vreme kada je Kićanović doneo sa sobom taj srpski mentalitet i kvalitet u Pezaro početkom osamdesetih godina i kada je omogućio Skavoliniju da osvoji Kup Kupova”, osvežio je sećanje Peterson. Italo-američki stručnjak i sportski komentator je istakao da je dolazak Teodosića i Markovića u Virtus i Rodrigeza i Skole u Milano podigao značajno nivo basketa u Italiji. “To posebno važi za Teodosića koji sa svojom vatrometnom igrom stalno pokušava da nam pruži spektakli, i veoma često uspeva”, zapaža Peterson.
Trofejni trener je skicirao i sve kvalitete Teodosića i komparativne prednosti u odnosu na druge igrače:”Vođenje lopte, dodavanja, šut za tri, izbačaj, šut sa zadrškom, to su sve karakteristike velikog igrača koje Miloš ima. Sposobnost da iz ničega stvori nešto je kvalitet koji su imali Dražen Petrović, ali i Danilović, ili Đorđević. To su igači koji imaju pobednički mentalitet utkan u svoj DNK. Protiv Miloša nema odbrane: ako misliš da mu zatvoriš reket i primoraš ga na šut, ideš ka samoubistvu, kao i obratno. Miloševo čitanje akcije uvek je perfektno”.
Peterson je odbacio i primedbu da se Teodosić nikada ne smeje i da mu je to mana:”Ma kakvi - odbrusio je Dan - Majk D’Antoni se nikada nije smejao, Dino Menegin takođe, veliki šampioni su takvi, nikada ne dozvoljavaju da ih emocije izdaju”.
Rekorder u broju postignutih koševa u dresu Virtusa Renato Vilalta je bio u dvorani, u prvom redu kada je Miloš postigao koš protiv Monaka:”Pao mi je gotovo u zagrljaj. Miloš je fenomenalan. Kada je zdrav on je dva ili tri nivoa iznad ostalih. Nekad se čini da je ostao bez snage a onda sve iznenadi i preuzme odgovornost. Veoma je lepo videti ga izbliza kako igra. Imresionira me brzina s kojom razmišlja dok igra, uvek vidi dalje i ranije od drugih, pravi ulaze ili šutira kada i kako hoće. Za svoje klupske drugove je kao Maradona. U Milošu vidim Danilovićevu karakteristiku da “ubije” protivnika kada je to potrebno sa odlučnošću koja te ostavi bez reči”, rekao je Vilalta.
Inače, Korijere delo Sport je rešio da svoje čitaoce u subotu obraduje i poklonom u vidu Teodosićevog postera. 



Piše: Željko PANTELIĆ
text:
Basketball trance in Italy because of Teodosic, the flush of comparison with Maradon, Danilovic, Kicanovic…
So the false myth is that Theo is not good at defense? What are similarities with Drazen Petrovic? Why aren't greats in the field showing emotion? What giant bought a granddaughter Tea's jersey?

01 Nov 2019

(From MOZZART Sport correspondent from Rome)
Milos Teodosic's winning basket against Monaco in Eurocup served as a slapstick to Corriere deeds Sport to dedicate a whole page to him, reminding him that Milos had enough a month to "fool" Bologna and basketball Italy. Teodosic was the alpha and omega in all of Virtus' wins in October, but he literally decided the final result in the turning or last seconds of the match in the matches against Venice, Virtus, Brescia and Monaco.
A basket against Monaco with the sound of a siren that brought victory to Virtus caused Paladoc to be elated and lead the Corriere to conduct a small poll among basketball legends. Dan Peterson, Charlie Rekalkati and Renato Vilalta talked about Teodosic in superlatives in a text entitled "Teodosic is our Maradona".
"I am in love with Teodosic," Rekalkati said, adding that he had bought a Teodosic jersey in Moscow while Milos was playing for CSKA as a gift to his grandson. "There are few players who can hit decisive shots in the match final. Milos is one of them. I started following him from the EP in Gorizia for players under the age of 20 when he was named best player. Teodosic is the first player that comes to mind when you think of who could play the basketball you want. It is a great pleasure to watch him work with ease that is extremely difficult for others. I am fascinated by the way it controls the flow of the match. He doesn't always play the same, he adjusts to the course of the match and the needs of his team, ”Rekalkati said.
An Italian expert also says it is a false myth that Teodosic does not play well in defense. "Basically, he reads opponents' actions well and knows how to prevent them, though he is much better at accomplishing other tasks. The hug he received from his clubmates after the match with Monaco is not a banal affair and is not an instinctive gesture. It was a recognition of his leadership role on the team, ”Rekalkati said.
Rekalkati added that the last shot against Monaco was not in the style of Danilovic but of Basile. The legendary Dan Peterson, who has a longer memory than Rekalkati, shot reminded Dragan Kicanovic. Cups, ”Peterson recalled. An Italian-American expert and sports commentator pointed out that the arrival of Teodosic and Markovic in Virtus and Rodriguez and Skola in Milan raised a significant level of basketball in Italy. "This is especially true of Teodosic, who with his fireworks constantly tries to give us spectacles, and very often succeeds," notes Peterson.
The trophy coach also sketched all of Teodosic's qualities and comparative advantages over other players: “Running the ball, passing, shot for three, strikeout, shot with hold, these are all the characteristics of a great player that Milos has. The ability to create something out of nothing is a quality that Drazen Petrovic had, as well as Danilovic or Djordjevic. These are players who have a winning mentality woven into their DNA. There is no defense against Milos: if you think of closing his racket and forcing him to kick, you are going to commit suicide, and vice versa. Milos' reading of the action is always perfect. "
Peterson also dismissed the remark that Teodosic should never laugh and that this is a flaw: "Whatever," Dan replied, Mike D'Antoni never laughed, Dino Menegin also, the big champions are like that, they never let emotions they betray ”.
The record in the number of points scored in the Virtus jersey by Renato Vilalta was in the hall, in the first place when Milos scored the basket against Monaco: “I almost fell into a hug. Milos is phenomenal. When healthy he is two or three levels above the rest. Sometimes he seems to be out of power and then all of a sudden he takes responsibility. It's really nice to see him up close playing. I am impressed by the speed with which he thinks as he plays, always seeing further and earlier than others, making entrances or kicking when and how he wants. For his club mates, it's like Maradona. In Milos, I see Danilovic's characteristic of "killing" an opponent when needed with a determination that leaves you speechless, "Vilalta said.
By the way, Corriere's work Sport decided to treat his readers with a gift in the form of a Teodosic poster on Saturday.



By Zeljko PANTELIC
